body:
Please don't lock this as this isn't the same as the other FPS Drop topic I made. My brother has a 4 month old laptop that used to get 200 FPS but now when he tried to update to 1.8 he gets awful FPS, like 20 - 30. When he tried to play on 1.7 again, he still had 20 - 30 FPS. Does anyone know how to fix this?




ps Sorry for all the "help" topics I've bene posting recently ;3

title: 1.8 FPS Drops (Not the same as other topic)

replies.body: Thanks :) I think it may work ^_^
